What are the features?\n• Check Balance- This feature allows you to check your current balance.

• Pay Balance- This feature allows you to pay your balance.

If you have no balance then it won't accept the payment.

Just click on the submit/pay button to complete the payment action.

• Student Loans- This feature allows you to get a student loan.

If you already have an outstanding balance equal to or greater than 1 peso, you are not allowed to get a student loan.

Our program allows you to borrow a maximum amount of 50,000 pesos.
